name: Burg_206
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues-influenced dialect with nautical jargon
diet: salted fish, kelp preserves, barter staples
local ceremonies center on safe passage and reagent blessings
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
limited combustion industry (no high-pressure steam megatech)
notes: small sheltered cove serving irregular shipping routes
population fluctuates with shipping and ritual seasons
